headline: Warren Buffett Ditches Bitcoin-Linked Nu Holdings, Adds To Constellation Brands, Domino's Pizza, Pool Corp Stakes
summary: As legendary investor Warren Buffett prepares to step down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE:BRK) (NYSE:BRK) by the end of 2025, a 13F filing released on Thursday reveals how his team reshaped the firm's portfolio in the first quarter. What ...

headline: Warren Buffett More Than Doubles His Stake in Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ)
summary: It was recently disclosed that Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has increased its stake in Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ). Let us shed some light on this development. Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) is a leading international producer and marketer of beer, wine, and spirits with operations in the U.S., Mexico, New Zealand, and Italy. The company has […]
